name: HyperGraphRAG (LHRLAB)
description: [项目级] [NeurIPS 2025] Official resources of "HyperGraphRAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation via Hypergraph-Structured Knowledge Representation".。来源: https://github.com/LHRLAB/HyperGraphRAG

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
conda create -n hypergraphrag python=3.11
conda activate hypergraphrag
pip install -r requirements.txt

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

genes.title: hypergraphrag 模块说明
genes.content: Official resources of **"HyperGraphRAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation via Hypergraph-Structured Knowledge Representation"**. Haoran Luo, Haihong E, Guanting Chen, Yandan Zheng, Xiaobao Wu, Yikai Guo, Qika Lin, Yu Feng, Zemin Kuang, Meina Song, Yifan Zhu, Luu Anh Tuan. **NeurIPS 2025** \[[paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.21322)\].
